user.description:
The serial port can be a normal serial port like '/dev/ttyUSB0', but can also be any [URL handler as supported by PySerial](https://pyserial.readthedocs.io/en/latest/url_handlers.html).

This can come in handy when addressing USB adapters by serial with `hwgrep://` or use `rfc2217://hostname_or_ip` to connect through an rfc2217 compatible server for more advanced usecases.

send_raw.name: Send raw LG TV serial command
send_raw.description: Send raw commands to the TV, intended for debugging.

command1.name: Command 1
command1.description: First command letter, called COMMAND1 in the documentation.

command2.name: Command 2
command2.description: Second command letter, called COMMAND2 in the documentation.

data.name: Data
data.description: Data bytes to send, called DATA in the documentation. This is a hex string, e.g. 000102.
